about.title: About me
about.description_0: More than 3 years creating and maintaining applications and services in different programming languages.
about.description_1: Graduate of the Information Systems Engineering program at Escuela Superior La Pontificia in Per√∫.
about.description_2: From planning and structuring to implementation and deployment. I love working with modern, stable and Open Source technologies.
about.description_3: I almost always strive to implement my own tools in a way that makes me comfortable working with them, from components and libraries like toasts to complete UI systems for each project and company I work with. Whenever possible, I try to publish my developments on npm or deploy them on my own subdomains so other developers can use them.
